original_text: While Solomon was alive, Judah and Israel were safe from their enemies. In the whole country, from Dan to Beersheba, every family had a place to live and they could grow food to eat.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 사는 동안에 유다와 이스라엘이 단에서부터 브엘세바에 이르기까지 각기 포도나무 아래와 무화과나무 아래에서 평안히 살았더라

sentences.original_text: Judah and Israel were safe from their enemies
every family had a place to live
and they could grow food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 먹을 음식을 키울 수 있었다
